entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with freezing drizzle. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Snowfall amount 5 cm except 2 cm over northern sections. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 09:09 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 09:09 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
